name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shorty: Short on time. Long on knowledge.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shorty summarizes content into easy to read snippets so you can be wiser with your time. From your friends at Deutsch LA.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Look, the Internet is swamped with intriguing articles, but no one's got time for all that. Enter Shorty.

Shorty is powered by AI and offers 5 summary options for any article:
Simple Summary
Explain Like I'm 5
Humor Me
Why Should I Care
Clickbait

You can also ask Shorty to answer specific follow-up questions. So why are you still reading this? Go on, download Shorty to make your life a bit smarter, and a whole lot easier.
